projects.title: Dynamic Portfolio generator
projects.description: Employed REST API's to perform 3-legged authentication for linkedIn. Scraped data from LinkedIn and Github using Puppeteer. Used socket programming to send the scrapped data between middleware server and client. Hosting: https://mohammedabdullahportfolio.web.app/

projects.title: E-commerce Advertising Landing page
projects.description: Built a website for a startup company, Gazal Capital using ReactJS in javascript styled partially with MUI and Tailwind css.

projects.title: Construction Site
projects.description: Developed an advertising website for an constructing company using ReactJS library. and hosted in Cloudflare.

projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: Link: https://mohammedabdullah.pages.dev , Built a static website for display of personal projects and deployed it in Cloudflare pages, which is a desktop-first website.

projects.title: Bank Flutter Application
projects.description: Performed CRUD operations using SQLite database locally within the app. Created models for database tables in dart. Demonstrated UI navigation and transitions.
